scripts.test: npm run-script test-local && npm run-script test-browser
scripts.test-browser-phantom: browserify -t coffeeify -t spec/frontend/*.*  | tape-run --browser phantom | tap-spec
scripts.release: npm run-script build-client && npm run-script build-server
scripts.build-client: browserify -i ws -t coffeeify -t -r ./src/runShellCommand.js:run client.js | uglifyjs -c > release/public/client.js
scripts.build-server: browserify -t coffeeify --node --detect-globals false --no-bundle-external server.js > release/server.js && cd release && npm prune && npm install --production --no-progress
